tracks.text: Text. Parental advisory and viewer warning: The following video contains explicit content and depicts graphic violence which may be offensive to some viewers. Viewer discretion is advised.
A pink, lacy bed is covered with knives, guns, hand cuffs, swords, brass knuckles, fetish gear, and other weapons.
A pink bear's mouth is covered with a duck tape, with a red kiss print over its mouth.
A woman picks up a lipstick bullet labelled Prada.
Yellow text appears. Taste. Directed by Dave Meyers.
Sabrina Carpenter, a blond young woman, picks up a large chef's knife. She applies dark purple lipstick, using the knife as a mirror.
She enters the front door of a mansion, wielding a machete
Wearing a low cut blue top and tight black pants, she slowly enters a bedroom, machete over her head.
She strolls past the sleeping body of a couple.
She beats the woman's body with the machete. Feathers fly. She grabs the head, which is a volley ball wearing makeup.
Jenna Ortega, a tanned brunette woman, appears from behind and fires a shotgun.
Carpenter shuffles from side to side, dodging several shots.
Carpenter mouths lyrics, and Ortega fires. Blood splatters erupts from her back, dotting the floor, a lamp, and the doors.
Carpenter flies back and falls over a balcony. Ortega runs over, as the Boyfriend looks up.
Ortega looks over the bloody balcony railing to Carpenter, who lies impaled by a white picket fence. She looks up, and Ortega waves, smiling
Carpenter looks at a knife in her hand, and tosses it up. It lands in Ortega's eye.
Carpenter flips her off. Ortega glares.
Carpenter lies on a hospital bed, while surgeons pull the fence pickets out. She wears a pink dress with white polka dots and a blocky pink stiletto.
Carpenter gets up, and the surgeons look through the gaping hole in her chest.
Ortega, wearing a white mini dress, eyepatch, and nurse's hat approaches with defibrilator paddles. She shoves Carpenter, who convulses.
Carpenter turns around, and Ortega presses the paddles against her chest. Carpenter falls back.
Ortega presses the paddles to Carpenter's face, and her heart monitor flatlines. Carpenter falls back, and Ortega tosses the paddles and walks away.
In a purple dress, Ortega sits with Boyfriend by the fireplace. Carpenter watches through the window from behind a hedge and picks up a brunette doll.
Carpenter bends the doll back, and Ortega whips her head back, grabbing at her lower back.
Ortega whacks her head on a pillow. Carpenter is hitting the dolls face against the hedge, smiling.
Ortega pulls out a blonde doll. Carpenter rips the head off her doll.
Ortega's head flies back. As she readjusts her head, she flings the blond doll into the fireplace.
Carpenter stumbles to her feet, her arms on fire.
Ortega laughs as Carpenter's burning body runs across the lawn.
Ortega and Boyfriend embrace in the shower.
Carpenter pulls the curtain aside and brandishes a knife.
Ortega picks up a sickle and swipes at Carpenter. An arm falls to floor, squirting blood.
Boyfriend, covered in blood, screams. Carpenter, with blood pouring out of the stub of her missing right arm, points at them while backing away, and mouths lyrics
Ortega, covered in blood, smiles gleefully
Carpenter, wearing white lingerie, runs down the stairs, with Ortega in pursuit. Carpenter trips at the last step.
Ortega wraps Carpenter's amputated arm around her neck and strangles her.
Carpenter goes limp. Ortega laughs and walks away.
By the pool, Ortega kisses Boyfriend.
She opens her eyes to see she's kissing Carpenter.
Ortega grabs a chainsaw and drives it into Carpenter's gut.
Carpenter bends over, grabbing at her wound, and stumbles back into the pool.
Ortega looks down. Carpenter floats in a pool turning red.
Ortega smiles as Carpenter runs up behind her.
Ortega notices her, then looks back.
Boyfriend is floating, bloody, in the pool. Carpenter smiles.
A picture covered in flowers labeled "In loving memory of Beloved Boyfriend". Carpenter and Ortega wear low cut black dresses while looking down at a casket.
An older woman in black cries over the casket. Carpenter and Ortega exchange glances and smile,
As the woman throws herself over the casket, Carpenter and Ortega walk away together.
